item.title: Understanding Kubernetes Container Probes
item.description: A probe is a diagnostic performed periodically by the kubelet on a container. To perform a diagnostic, the kubelet either executes code within the container or makes a network request. There are three types of probes in Kubernetes Liveness Probe indicates whether the container is running. Readiness Probe indicates whether the container is ready to respond to requests. Startup Probe indicates whether the container is started. Liveness Probe Link to heading The kubelet uses a liveness probe to know when to restart the container.
